metadata.title: RA6T2: Support motor types of HV inverter board

sections.content:
Question:
What kind of motor types HV inverter board support?
Answer:
You can use PM motor and Induction motor. About PM motor, Renesas are offering sample code and app note, so you can evaluate immediately using with these.
Suitable Products
RA6T2
